medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient woke up with diffuse abdominal pain that has worsened and remained constant, now localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) and increasing in intensity. Anorexia yesterday, emesis occurred twice. No dysuria despite some hesitancy in urination.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypothyroidism after left hemithyroidectomy for non-cancerous thyroid nodule, history of Horner's syndrome one year after thyroidectomy, anal condylomata, anxiety/depression. Surgical history includes left hemithyroidectomy, inguinal hernia repair, and resection of lip lesion.
medical_history.family_history: Father with diverticulitis, brother with suspected undiagnosed mental illness; patient experiences severe stress due to this.
